body: Ok so the short cheerleader sensei kinda reminds me of that short red varsity track suit wearing blonde chick from bleach. And the other guy reminds me of aizen..... is that a weird ship???
Only a bit over 2000 likes on a Vanilla Tankoubon that's uncensored? There's something wrong with this site.
After reading this, everything feels like it’s going to be okay.
my heart is dying from cuteness
holy fuck that was a tier SSR VANILLA goodness, like seriously proceed only with 13 insulin shots and a defibrillator
